          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">A Crossword</string>
            <string language="en">A Crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des Mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lle Parole incrociate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σταυρόλεξο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Solve the crossword! All the words have been used in this module.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
            <string language="en">Solve the crossword! All the words have been used in this module. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">crossword</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">crossword</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lösen Sie das Kreuzworträtsel! Alle 
Wörter sind in diesem Modul verwendet worden. Safir - Englisch 
und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 3 - wie geht es Ihnen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résolvez les mots croisé ! Tous les mots 
ont été utilisés dans ce module. Safir - l'anglais et vie 
active pour des débutants - module 3 - comment allez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resolva o crossword! Todas as palavras 
foram usadas neste módulo. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 3 - como é você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risolva le parole incrociate! Tutte le 
parole sono state usate in questo modulo. Safir - inglese e vita
attiva per i principianti - modulo 3 - come siete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λύστε το σταυρόλεξο! Όλες οι λέξεις έχουν 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε αυτήν την ενότητα. Safir - αγγλική και
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 3 - πώς 
είστε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Solucione el crucigrama! Todas las 
palabras se han utilizado en este módulo. ¿Safir - inglés y 
vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 3 - cómo es usted?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
